name: Dead by Daylight - Chains of Hate
name_original: Dead by Daylight - Chains of Hate
description: Chains of Hate is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Deathslinger, a Survivor, Zarina Kassir and a Map. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the survivor.
